mean_cn: n.挽具，马具；  v.治理（河流等）
mean_en: "a set of strips of leather and metal pieces that is put around a horse’s head and body so that the horse can be controlled and fastened to a carriage
sentence: A harness is fastened around the horse\u0027s head and body.
sentence_trans: 一套马具绑在马的头上和身上。
word_etyma: har军队 + ness供给，供应 → harness提供给士兵的 → harness保护带；挽具
